version_description:
Thank you for all of your feedback! We're working on some exciting new streaming service features, so watch out for that in a coming update. In this version:

- Easily select all songs by a particular artist or playlist
- Reduces confusion about songs stored in iTunes Match
- Small other enhancements

-iPad Listen Support
-Support for latest software improvements
-Bug fixes
